name: Nymph
description: An enchanting nature spirit who charms enemies and heals allies with her mesmerizing beauty.

abilities.name: Charm
abilities.description: Enchant an enemy unit to fight for the Fae temporarily.

abilities.name: Rejuvenation
abilities.description: Heal a friendly unit over time.

abilities.name: Sleep
abilities.description: Put an enemy to sleep. Damage will wake them.
